attributes.review:
I opened this app with pure love that my lost dad had found himself as a part of this awesome Cheeto army. I am proud to be a new Cheeto boy and support all endangered daddy Cheetos. I praise this app to not go to get milk as I will do it. We will go fishing tomorrow and hopefully he has 2020 vision to see all the beautiful fish.
The only problem is the fact that he is a Cheeto with no arms so giving him a rod will be a problem. The water will turn him into Cheeto dust and we will mourn his death while eating some flamin hot munchies and hold up my orange Cheeto 2020 sign.
attributes.title: This app is my new dad

attributes.review:
I downloaded this app because Mr. President Trump promised that there would be some very exclusive, special pictures of him on there. I looked for hours and could not find any. When the President of this great country promises something like that, he should deliver! My opinion has changed about him since downloading this app! I used to worship the ground he walked on but now I see that he is a CON MAN!!! 
With that being said, I am still in the market for any *special* pictures of him and would like to find some ASAP!!!
attributes.title: CON MAN!!!

attributes.review: I’m repulsed 👁👄👁 i open the app and see this big fat racist fake tanned nasty smelling fat beach y’all call a president and no ❤️. It recommended me drugs and gave places to find trump (Cheeto) flavored juul pods.......? This app will STEAL your tv remotes, deactivate your smart tablets, take your children hostage in Moscow and post a scandalous ransom. Not only did this app DISRESPECT me it deeply offends me 🙄 don’t get this steaming piece of mush you may call an APP unless you want do your life’s value to drop like intelligent peoples respect for trump. Literal garbage I wish I could’ve given this app ZERO STARS
attributes.title: DISGUSTING ✨❤️😹

attributes.review:
When I opened the app I saw something that I can’t even describe it was really really awful!
I’m shaking in my boots just writing this review ,just remembering the “thing” I saw 😰is terrifying I was really expected more on this app but i was disappointed and spooked ,i-I can’t even describe this app in words it’s horrible, terrible!!!
This app is not what I expected it was just not it I thought the president was going to give us a great app but it was horrible absolutely awful the quality is horrible!!!!
attributes.title: DO NOT RECOMMEND!!!!

attributes.review:
when i first got the app it said make america great again how is he doing that by continuing racism, to african americans, hispanics, muslims, and chinese. THEN he  had the AUDACITY to ask for my phone number?! UH no thanks creeper you can have fun jerking off to your daughter not me. and after all these crazy things trump says he really wants to delete tiktok😑 like omg i’m so sorry little baby that we scared you with fairy emojis🧚‍♀️✨SIKE and well do it again. gen z a bad b you can’t kill us!! OUR WAY OR THE HIGHWAY
  if🌞you👈🏼ban😑tiktok👾we🤣will🙂cut🔪off⚠️your👹cheeto🎃
attributes.title: free tiktok

attributes.review: ok so i downloaded it & when i opened i seen a orange colored man on the screen🤨. i thought this app was supposed to help me find the next ‘trump’🥴 rally. INSTEAD I AM TRAUMATIZED by the extremely horrific ORANGEMAN🤢🍊🍊! what kind of sorcery alienated magic is this 🤬. by the time i downloaded the app it was sending me notifications when i never allowed it to 🙄🙄. i didn’t ask for this useless information🤮. please delete this . i would NEVER want anyone’s children to see something like this.
attributes.title: this.. needs to politely head out🤮🤚🏽.

attributes.review: Was excited to have a one stop shop for my news but it asks for my number which I thought was alright. But now I keep getting calls and voicemails in Chinese and text messages with links in them and I’m scared! I’m going to delete my app and see if it continues because it’s up to 5 a day. Whenever I turn my phone on it opens with this app first which is worrisome and it glitches a lot. Would recommend just looking everything up online! Sketchy app! DONT GIVE UR NUMBER!
attributes.title: PLZ read!

attributes.review: I don’t know why, but it kept showing me pictures of this well known pedo😭I fear that he’s in the corner of my room, or when I’m eating cheetos🤬I cant even see the colour orange the same again🟧I find this app horrible if it’s going to give others nightmares😼We need it gone👊it’s No bueno😿And it kept saying make America great again when it didn’t show me how💀So i kind of felt useless😾So technically it’s telling me I am useless and that’s bullying🙀So at the end of the day this app bullied me and gave me nightmares👁👄👁
attributes.title: Ah this App😭

attributes.review: I initially downloaded this app with good intentions, but was quickly traumatized by the image of a big, naked cheeto puff of a man - AKA Donald Trump. My very existence was so disturbed by the sheer nakedness of Mr. Trump that not only did my cell phone begin to glitch, but my entire house lost power. It was been approximately 16 hours since this certain power outage and I fear that I am in grave danger of starvation and dehydration... not to mention my phone’s about to die. Please do not under any circumstances download this app, it is offensive, homophobic, racist and just plain ugly.
attributes.title: 🚫🚫🚫 offensive 🚫🚫🚫

attributes.review: i woke up on a normal wednesday morning in my garage, to see the trump app pop up in the app store. i decided to download it to se what it was all about, and what appeared on my screen as i opened the app was a big and sweaty disgusting water bear. how awful! i got out of the garage to make myself a cup of boiled orange juice. i seen something in the corner of my eye, and when i turned around, a huge striped dog was infront of me! how horrifying! so i ran out of my bathroom, and flew my pet giraffe to auto zone. when i got into auto zone, everyone was dressed up in baby bumblebee costumes, so i stormed out of there, only to find bob saget in front of me. he tried to talk to me about the trump app, which was absolutely ridiculous, so i drove my tv back to my garage, and deleted the trump app off of my phone. horrible app!
attributes.title: this app is horrible!
